name: Farnham Aviation Services
about: Farnham Aviation Services is a premier flight training institution based in Iowa, specializing in comprehensive flight and ground instruction. We offer a range of certifications, including Private Pilot, Commercial, Flight Instructor (CFI), and tail wheel endorsements, a unique service among few flight schools in the region. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training to ensure students achieve their aviation goals. With a focus on safety and excellence, Farnham Aviation Services is committed to delivering high-quality training and supporting the aviation community. Whether you're a novice or an experienced pilot, we are dedicated to helping you soar to new heights.
